product_description: teal green iphone 15 silicon backcase with non shiny glittery spots in light green color through the case

copy_data.primary_copy: Ethereal sparkle meets everyday protection. A dreamy teal case with delicate glitter that catches light like morning dew.
copy_data.headline: Subtle Magic for Your iPhone 15
copy_data.description: Wrap your iPhone in sophisticated protection with our teal silicon case, adorned with soft green glitter that adds elegance without overwhelming.

claude_optimized_prompt: Photorealistic product shot of a teal green iPhone case with subtle light green glitter spots, placed on a frosted glass surface with morning sunlight casting gentle shadows, soft bokeh background in muted sage tones, minimalist composition with negative space, shallow depth of field, 8K commercial photography

image_generation_result.revised_prompt: A photorealistic product shot of a teal green iPhone case with subtle light green glitter spots, placed on a frosted glass surface. Morning sunlight casts gentle shadows on the surface. The background features a soft bokeh effect in muted sage tones, creating a minimalist composition with plenty of negative space. The image has a shallow depth of field, with the iPhone case as the main focus. The photo is presented in 8K resolution, commercial photography style, showcasing high-detail textures and lighting for a premium aesthetic.
image_generation_result.original_prompt: Photorealistic product shot of a teal green iPhone case with subtle light green glitter spots, placed on a frosted glass surface with morning sunlight casting gentle shadows, soft bokeh background in muted sage tones, minimalist composition with negative space, shallow depth of field, 8K commercial photography
